markdownRemark.html:
We don’t choose our parents. I know most haven’t reflected on the fact that being born to this world is not of our own choosing. Okay, religious people will credit a “creator” I hope I can capture my deep appreciation of life in this blog post.

I was born to a poor family in San Ildefonso, a town two hours from Mnaila, the Philippines’s Capital in 1985.

frontmatter.title: Genetic Lottery and why I became an Agnostic..
